Actions.Text: REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
AMEND (T) AND RECOMMIT TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE
REFERRED TO ETHICS AND INTERNAL GOVERNANCE

Title: Prohibits statewide elected officers and certain appointed officers from receiving compensation for any book or other published work written during the course of their term of service
Summary: Prohibits statewide elected officers and certain appointed officers from receiving compensation for any book or other published work written during the course  of their term of service.
LawCode: Amd ยง74, Pub Off L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public officers law, in relation to prohibiting elected officers from publishing books about his or her time in office while still holding the position of such office
